TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EdmFunctionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class EdmFunctionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class EdmFunctionAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 屬性，套用到方法時，表示該方法是概念模型或儲存體模型中函式的 Proxy。

span.span: An attribute that, when applied to a method, indicates that the method is a proxy for a function in the conceptual model or storage model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連結至另一個函式的 common language runtime (CLR) 方法。An links a common language runtime (CLR) method to another function. 比方說，此屬性可用來對應 CLR 方法，由儲存提供者所公開的函式、 使用者定義函式在資料庫中，或在概念模型中的使用者定義函式。For example, the attribute can be used to map a CLR method to a function that is exposed by the storage provider, to a user-defined function in the database, or to a user-defined function in the conceptual model. 具有這個屬性的方法可以呼叫從 LINQ to Entities 查詢中。Methods that have this attribute can be called from LINQ to Entities queries. 若要使用若要將 CLR 方法對應至函式，下列必須為 true:To use an to map a CLR method to a function, the following must be true: - CLR 方法的傳回型別必須與對應之函式的傳回型別相容。The return type of the CLR method must be compatible with the return type of the mapped-to function. - CLR 方法的引數類型必須對應到函式的引數類型相容。The argument types of the CLR method must be compatible with the argument types of the mapped-to function. 如需相容的類型資訊，請參閱[概念模型型別 (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/987b995f-e429-4569-9559-b4146744def4)。For information about compatible types, see [Conceptual Model Types (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/987b995f-e429-4569-9559-b4146744def4).

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: namespaceName

span.span: The namespace of the mapped-to function.
The name of the mapped-to function.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連結至另一個函式的 common language runtime (CLR) 方法。An links a common language runtime (CLR) method to another function. 比方說，此屬性可用來對應 CLR 方法，由儲存提供者所公開的函式、 使用者定義函式在資料庫中，或在概念模型中的使用者定義函式。For example, the attribute can be used to map a CLR method to a function that is exposed by the storage provider, to a user-defined function in the database, or to a user-defined function in the conceptual model. 具有這個屬性的方法可以呼叫從 LINQ to Entities 查詢中。Methods that have this attribute can be called from LINQ to Entities queries. 若要使用若要將 CLR 方法對應至函式，下列必須為 true:To use an to map a CLR method to a function, the following must be true: - CLR 方法的傳回型別必須與對應之函式的傳回型別相容。The return type of the CLR method must be compatible with the return type of the mapped-to function. - CLR 方法的引數類型必須對應到函式的引數類型相容。The argument types of the CLR method must be compatible with the argument types of the mapped-to function. 如需相容的類型資訊，請參閱[概念模型型別 (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/987b995f-e429-4569-9559-b4146744def4)。For information about compatible types, see [Conceptual Model Types (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/987b995f-e429-4569-9559-b4146744def4).
